    • Uses of GeneticDecoder in com.ashwin.fri.genetic

      Methods in com.ashwin.fri.genetic with parameters of type GeneticDecoder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GeneticChromosome GeneticAlgorithm.run(GeneticDecoder decoder, java.util.Properties props)
      Runs the binary genetic algorithm with the specified fitness calculator and the specified properties.
      Constructors in com.ashwin.fri.genetic with parameters of type GeneticDecoder 
      Constructor and Description
      GeneticChromosome(GeneticDecoder decoder, boolean[] genome)
      Creates a new GeneticChromosome from a specified bit array.
      GeneticChromosome(GeneticDecoder decoder, int bits)
      Creates a new GeneticChromosome with the specified number of randomized bits.
      GeneticPopulation(GeneticDecoder decoder, java.util.Properties props)
      Creates a new GeneticPopulation with randomized chromosomes using the genetic algorithm parameters specified by the properties file.
      GeneticPopulation(GeneticDecoder decoder, java.util.Properties props, GeneticChromosome[] pop)
      Creates a new GeneticPopulation from an existing chromosome array.
